items.name: static let cubic: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Smooth spline calculation between keyframe values.

items.name: static let cubicPaced: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Cubic keyframe values are interpolated to produce an even pace throughout the animation.

items.name: static let discrete: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Each keyframe value is used in turn, no interpolated values are calculated.

items.name: static let linear: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Simple linear calculation between keyframe values.

items.name: static let paced: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Linear keyframe values are interpolated to produce an even pace throughout the animation.
